Text: I was quite amazed to listen to this old vinyl a few weeks ago. Didn't think much of it back in the olden days, but hearing it now, I really like it! It's actually one of the few albums emerging from the 80' that survive to this day and perhaps even mature. Forget about that Abba thing, though, there are tracks like Murder. Play it on a good play-back system!
That cover of Abba, still give me the shivers. That is one solid cover! Thanks Heiko
